meanings.sent1: She prestructures her study schedule before the semester starts.
meanings.sent2: It is important to prestructures your work tasks to stay organized.
meanings.sent3: John always prestructures his jokes before telling them to his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her mind prestructures the steps needed to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The coach prestructures the team's game plan for success.

meanings.definition: Something that is constructed or organized beforehand
meanings.sent1: The prestructures of the building were carefully designed by the architect.
meanings.sent2: The prestructures of the event ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The prestructures of the party included decorations and music.
meanings.sent4: The prestructures of the project were solid and well thought out.
meanings.sent5: The prestructures of the lesson helped the students understand the topic better.
